amendment.description: Amendment divides the current Ninth Circuit Court into three new judicial Circuits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 108-723 to insert a new section after section 5.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Simpson amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 205 - 194 (Roll no. 492).
